description: A deeply ingrained social norm emphasizing generosity and welcoming guests, even strangers. Failure to offer hospitality can be seen as a grave offense.
examples: Insisting guests stay for a meal.

description: The collective reputation and dignity of a family, influencing individual behavior and decisions. Protecting family honor is paramount.
examples: Avoiding actions that could bring shame upon the family.

description: A fundamental social norm where older individuals are accorded high respect, their advice is valued, and their presence is honored.
examples: Standing up when an elder enters a room.
Kissing the hand of an elder.
